title: Kristen Faulkner Stuns the Favorites, Brings Gold to USA in Sensational Olympic Road Race Coup
content:
Alaskan star becomes first U.S. woman in 40 years to win road race gold after audacious 3km attack from heavy-hitter group of four.

Read the full article at Kristen Faulkner Stuns the Favorites, Brings Gold to USA in Sensational Olympic Road Race Coup on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
